file.name: students.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Students API
  description: 'Manage Students'
  termsOfService: http://swagger.io/terms/
  version: 1.0.0
tags:
  - name: Students
    description: Students List.

paths:
  /students:
    get:
      tags:
        - Students
      summary: Lists all students
      description: List all students, number and name
      parameters:
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: Limits the number of Students returned
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        200:
          description: the list of students
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/StudentListResponse'
    post:
      tags:
        - Students
      summary: Adds a new student to the list
      requestBody:
        description: Student information
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Student'
      responses:
        200:
          description: The student was added to the list with success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/StudentAddedResponse'
        400:
          description: A student with such number exists
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AppError'

  /students/{number}:
    get:
      tags:
        - Students
      summary: Returns student details
      description: Returns a single student
      parameters:
        - name: number
          in: path
          description: Number of student to return
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
          example: 472349
      responses:
        200:
          description: Student found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Student'
        404:
          description: Student not found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AppError'

components:
  schemas:
    AppError:
      type: object
      description: Application error
      required:
        - code
        - name
        - message
      properties:
        code:
          type: number
          format: integer
          description: Internal error code
          example: 1000
        name:
          type: string
          description: Internal error name
          example: FAIL
        message:
          type: string
          description: Error description message
          example: An error occurred
    StudentAddedResponse:
      type: object
      description: Student successfully added to list
      required:
        - number
      properties:
        number:
          type: integer
    StudentResponse:
      type: object
      description: Response with a student
      properties:
        student:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Student'

    StudentListResponse:
      type: object
      description: Response with a list of students
      properties:
        students:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Student'

    Student:
      type: object
      description: Student data
      required:
        - number
        - name
        - email
      properties:
        number:
          type: integer
          description: student number
          example: 467237
        name:
          type: string
          description: student name
          example: Filipe
